SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

io.libraft.algorithm
Interface Store

public interface Store

Metadata storage service that stores metadata required by a Raft server to participate in a Raft cluster.

Implementations only have to guarantee that individual operations are atomic. They do not have to validate the data being stored or returned. All implementation-specific checked exceptions must be wrapped in a StorageException and rethrown.

Method Summary

          Remove all (election term, server voted for) pairs from durable storage.

getVotedFor

@Nullable
String getVotedFor(long term)
                   throws StorageException
Get the unique id of the Raft server for whom the local Raft server voted in election term term.

Parameters:
term - election term >= 0 for which the vote record should be retrieved
Returns:
unique id of the Raft server for whom the local Raft server voted in election term term. This may be the id of the local Raft server itself (if it were a candidate and voted for itself), or null if it did not vote. Implementations may choose to return null or throw a RuntimeException if there is no vote record for term
Throws:
StorageException

setVotedFor

void setVotedFor(long term,
                 String server)
                 throws StorageException
Add or update a vote history record. The record has the form: term (election term) => server (server voted for).

Parameters:
term - election term >=0 for which the vote history should be set
server - unique id of the Raft server for whom the local Raft server voted in election term term. This may be the id of the local Raft server itself (if it were a candidate and voted for itself), or null if it did not vote
Throws:
StorageException

clearVotedFor

void clearVotedFor()
                   throws StorageException
Remove all (election term, server voted for) pairs from durable storage.

This method should not be used after RaftAlgorithm is first initialized: it will wipe out all metadata and cause this Raft server to be in an inconsistent and dangerous state.

Throws:
StorageException
